title: ECP seeks report from Chief Secretary, IG regarding Sibi blast
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 30 (APP):The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) on Tuesday sought a report from the Chief Secretary and Inspector General (IG) of Balochistan regarding the Sibi blast.
The ECP spokesperson, in a statement, said that the Election Commission of Pakistan has taken notice of the blast that occurred during a political rally in the district of Sibi.
According to media reports, at least four people were killed, and five others were wounded in a bomb blast at a political party rally in Balochistanâ€™s Sibi.
